summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.0°C) and outside temperature (down 6.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12385 lux) and cloud levels (up 697 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14101 lux) and cloud levels (up 1645 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 697.0m lower than yesterday, 633.8m lower than the past week, 1645.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1027.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and light levels will be low during the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
